subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Gymnastics
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: China’s men’s team took the gold, and Britain slid from silver to bronze after Japan won an appeal. The United States team finished a distant fifth, 6.045 points back.
snippet: China’s men’s team took the gold, and Britain slid from silver to bronze after Japan won an appeal. The United States team finished a distant fifth, 6.045 points back.
